scripts.upgrade:phase1: echo '🔍 Testando build atual...' && pnpm build
scripts.upgrade:phase2: echo '📦 Fase 2: Migrações críticas' && pnpm remove @next/font && pnpm add next@14.2.15 eslint-config-next@14.2.15
scripts.upgrade:phase3: echo '📦 Fase 3: TypeScript' && pnpm add -D typescript@5.8.3 @types/node@24.1.0
scripts.upgrade:phase4: echo '📦 Fase 4: UI Dependencies' && pnpm add lucide-react@latest @radix-ui/react-collapsible@latest @radix-ui/react-dropdown-menu@latest @radix-ui/react-scroll-area@latest
scripts.backup: git add . && git commit -m '📦 Backup before upgrade phase'
